lead_paragraph: Svetlana Kuznetsova held off a strong challenge from Switzerland's Timea Bacsinszky in searing afternoon heat to book her place in the Miami Open final with a 7-5 6-3 victory on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Battling Kuznetsova Reaches Miami Open Final
headline.main: Battling Kuznetsova Reaches Miami Open Final

snippet: Svetlana Kuznetsova held off a strong challenge from Switzerland's Timea Bacsinszky in searing afternoon heat to book her place in the Miami Open final with a 7-5 6-3 victory on Thursday....
